document_data.name: Grumbelham Goldhand
document_data.mainbody: '''Grumbelham Goldhand''' was one of the innkeepers of the [[Wildlands Rest]], a wayside inn in the [[Silver Marches]].
document_data.Relationships: Gumbelham's adventuring and business partner was [[Irvag|Irvag the Bear]]. Both were enterprising souls.
document_data.History: In [[1371 DR]], the two old adventurers built and founded the Wildlands Rest. Despite their age, they were able to repel multiple [[orc]] attacks on their business. They continually expanded the location, adding additions to the building and upgrading furnishings.
